name: Grim Tales: Color of Fright Collector's Edition
name_original: Grim Tales: Color of Fright Collector's Edition
description:
Grim Tales: Color of Fright Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 06-11-2014. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Grim Tales: Color of Fright Collector's Edition is available on PC.
